name: Androsphinx
immunities: Psychic; Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks

specialAbilities.name: Inscrutable
specialAbilities.description: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

specialAbilities.name: Magic Weapons
specialAbilities.description: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

specialAbilities.name: Spellcasting
specialAbilities.description: The sphinx is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). It requires no material components to cast its spells. The sphinx has the following cleric spells prepared:

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The sphinx makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Roar
actions.description: The sphinx emits a magical roar. Each time it roars before finishing a long rest, the roar is louder and the effect is different, as detailed below. Each creature within 500 feet of the sphinx and able to hear the roar must make a saving throw.

actions.name: First Roar
actions.description: Each creature that fails a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw is frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Second Roar
actions.description: Each creature that fails a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw is deafened and frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature is paralyzed and can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Third Roar
actions.description: Each creature makes a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 44 (8d10) thunder damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

legendaryActions.name: The sphinx can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below
legendaryActions.description: Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The sphinx regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendaryActions.name: Claw Attack
legendaryActions.description: The sphinx makes one claw attack.

legendaryActions.name: Teleport
legendaryActions.description: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendaryActions.name: Cast a Spell
legendaryActions.description: The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.
